ol.li:
Contains exactly one [1..1] policyId with data type Id
A unique identifier that the payer or information source uses to identify the Policy Holder as belonging to a specific Plan.
Contains exactly one [1..1] policyTerm with data type Time Interval
Contains zero or more [0..*] coveredBenefit, where its type is Covered Benefit
Contains exactly one [1..1] group, where its type is Group Coverage
Contains exactly one [1..1] healthPlan, where its type is Health Plan
Contains exactly one [1..1] subscriber, where its type is Subscriber
Contains zero or one [0..1] coInsurance, where its type is Co Insurance
Contains zero or one [0..1] coPayment, where its type is Co Payment
Contains zero or one [0..1] deductible, where its type is Deductible
